title: New: Vessel –  Psychology Of Destructive Cult Leaders feat. Jabu
content: As far as first years go, 2012 has been a remarkable one for the 22 year old artist Vessel. His debut LP, Order of Noise, proved to be quite the critical hit when in dropped on Triangle Records in October. The order of noise is changing; Actress, Lukid and Hype Williams are all proving successful, to a public that finally seems able to accept more experimental forms of electronic music. His new cut, Psychology Of Destructive Cult Leaders, brings these textures and ideas to the fray once more, this time with Jabu, a fairly unknown MC with one mind-web of a flow. The dense, industrial and challenging sounds are still present, but it now features a remarkably human touch, that the album perhaps lacked.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
